Name: FLAMBERGE
About the game: FLAMBERGE is a tactics role-playing game featuring simultaneous turns . The player must plan out movements and attacks for each of their heroes, and then execute the turn. When the turn is executed, both heroes and enemies will move and attack at once. The player must anticipate enemy actions in order to win. Join a diverse array of heroes seeking to save their homeland from an invading force. Command your allies, instructing them to carry out various class abilities and utilize interesting items. Always think one step ahead.
